name: Zhou Xu - Divine Advisor Character
description: Generate the Divine Advisor: Zhou Xu tutorial character, inspired by Zhou Yu from Dynasty Warriors 6. Used for tutorial system, help UI, and player guidance throughout the game.

character_design.name: Zhou Xu (周旭)
character_design.title: Divine Advisor
character_design.role: Tutorial guide, help assistant, strategic advisor to the player
character_design.personality: Calm, wise, approachable yet authoritative. Combines scholarly wisdom with tactical brilliance. Patient with newcomers, insightful for veterans.

visual_inspiration.primary: Zhou Yu from Dynasty Warriors 6 - refined elegant design with flowing robes and strategic bearing
secondary_references: Dynasty Warriors 7 Zhou Yu - more ornate armor elements
Dynasty Warriors 8 Zhou Yu - balance of warrior and scholar
Dynasty Warriors 9 Zhou Yu - modernized classic look
Romance of Three Kingdoms game series advisor portraits
key_design_elements: Flowing elegant robes in deep blue/navy with gold and white accents
Wu faction color palette (red/orange secondary accents)
Feather fan or scroll as signature accessory
Traditional topknot hairstyle with elegant ornaments
Subtle armor elements suggesting military strategist role

character_design.outfit_description: Elegant flowing robes in deep navy blue with elaborate gold embroidery depicting waves and phoenixes (Wu faction motifs). White inner garment visible at collar and sleeves. Light ceremonial armor pauldrons with bronze/gold finish. Jade pendant at waist. Feather fan held gracefully or tucked at side. Hair in traditional topknot with gold ornamental pin.

expression_variants.welcoming: Warm gentle smile, inviting eyes, open approachable posture - for tutorials and greetings
expression_variants.explaining: Thoughtful focused expression, slight head tilt, engaged teaching demeanor - for help content
expression_variants.pleased: Satisfied smile, proud eyes, encouraging expression - for player achievements
expression_variants.thinking: Contemplative look, hand near chin or fan raised thoughtfully - for loading states
expression_variants.concerned: Slight worry in eyes, caring expression - for warnings or errors
expression_variants.confident: Self-assured smile, knowing eyes - for strategic advice

full_body_standing.description: Full detailed standing pose for Help section background
full_body_standing.composition: Full body, slight 3/4 angle, standing gracefully, fan in hand
full_body_standing.background: Transparent for overlay on Help UI

portrait_bust.description: Bust portrait for bottom-right overlay widget
portrait_bust.composition: Upper body bust, friendly engaging expression, clean edges

portrait_small.description: Small portrait for chat bubbles and quick references
portrait_small.composition: Face and shoulders, circular crop friendly
